type: Legendary Creature – Human Elder Knight Mercenary
rules_text:
[i]Counter[/i] – Whenever a source deals noncombat damage to you or a permanent you control, Titania deals 2 damage to that source's controller.
[i]Sol[/i] – Whenever a creature you control deals noncombat damage, you gain 3 life.
[i]Titania's Axe[/i] – Sacrifice a land: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
